plot: When some bad blood with old foes compromises their ideal Thanksgiving, the gang decides to make amends by breaking bread with those they've hurt.

When Dennis and Mac visit a video store to rent the newly released Thundergun, they get stopped when they learn that the Mcpoyles own it and will not them have it because of previous events. Since because of that, the gang decide to throw a party with all the people they have wronged in the past, including Rickety Cricket, the Mcpoyle twins, Bill Ponderosa, Hwang, and Gail the Snail.—James Hake
